title: Stake Engine Officially Announced
excerpt: Stake unveils Stake Engine — a powerful new game framework for developers, now powering Stake Originals and third-party titles.
contentHtml:
Stake has officially announced the launch of the Stake Engine — a cutting-edge Remote Gaming Server (RGS) designed to power both Stake's Originals and new third-party games. This platform offers developers the same high-performance framework that drives Stake's most popular titles, opening the door to unprecedented creative and technical possibilities.

With a strong focus on fairness, scalability, and seamless integration, Stake Engine gives studios the ability to build, test, and publish games directly to Stake's massive global audience. Developers can leverage its advanced tools, secure infrastructure, and real-time data systems to create engaging experiences that meet Stake's exacting standards.

Stake Engine also introduces streamlined compliance processes and cross-platform optimization — ensuring games run flawlessly across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

This announcement marks a major step forward in Stake's commitment to fostering innovative, high-quality gaming experiences for players worldwide.

title: ZeroEdge Studios Secures Stake Engine Access
excerpt: We've secured official access to Stake Engine — becoming an exclusive publisher for the Stake platform.
contentHtml:
ZeroEdge Studios is proud to announce that we now have official access to the Stake Engine — the same game framework powering Stake's Originals.

With this milestone, we've also become a Stake-exclusive publisher, meaning all of our games will be released directly and exclusively on the Stake platform. This ensures our titles meet Stake's highest standards for performance, fairness, and compliance — while reaching their massive global audience.

Our development team is already working on our first Stake-exclusive release, and we'll be sharing previews very soon.

title: The Official Launch of ZeroEdge Studios
excerpt: ZeroEdge Studios officially launches as a Stake-exclusive publisher — bringing innovative and fair slot games to Stake players worldwide.
contentHtml:
We're excited to officially launch ZeroEdge Studios — a new game studio creating innovative, high-quality slot games exclusively for Stake.

Following our recent Stake Engine access announcement, we're now positioned to deliver top-tier, transparent, and engaging games directly to Stake's global player base. As a Stake-exclusive publisher, every title we release will be fully optimized for the platform's ecosystem.

This is just the beginning — our first exclusive game is already in development, with more projects lined up. Stay tuned for updates, sneak peeks, and release dates.
